commands.description: Create a 3D object in the scene.

type.description: The type of object to create (e.g., cube, sphere, pyramid).

color.description: The color of the object (e.g., red, blue, green).

location.description: The coordinates where the object will be placed.

size.description: The size of the object. Can be a single number for uniform scaling or an object for non-uniform scaling.

commands.description: Move an object to a new location.

target.description: The name or ID of the object to move.

location.description: The new coordinates to move the object to.

commands.description: Rotate an object around its axes.

target.description: The name or ID of the object to rotate.

rotation.description: The rotation values in degrees for each axis.

target.description: The name or ID of the object to scale.

scale.description: The scale factor. Can be a single value for uniform scaling or an object for non-uniform scaling.

commands.description: Remove an object from the scene.

target.description: The name or ID of the object to delete.

commands.description: Change the color of an object.

target.description: The name or ID of the object to change color.

color.description: The new color (e.g., red, blue, green).

commands.description: Apply a texture to an object.

target.description: The name or ID of the object to apply texture to.

texture.description: The path or identifier of the texture to apply.

commands.description: Make an object transparent or opaque.

target.description: The name or ID of the object to change transparency.

transparency.description: A value between 0 (fully transparent) and 1 (fully opaque).

commands.description: Change the background color or image of the scene.
Create a duplicate of an existing object.

target.description: The name or ID of the object to duplicate.

location.description: The new location for the duplicated object.
